Elsie the Coward

Laura Mullen





Is a title that lies
All alone on a blank
Page see you can’t
See her here she’s
Rawhide hiding
Far and wide but we
Hear here her murmur
Oh I hate this notoriety

This body-shaped
Absence my body

Elsie the C flings
Her skirts up over
Her face when faced
With the paparazzi
Were you she asks
Eagerly looking
Her voice slightly
Muffled for me
